Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, east of the Riverdell Tranquility Park.
Room.LongDescription: The Tranquility Park is a vast, restful place where people go to enjoy a day in the park. It is also the home of the Riverdell Center for Tracking Training, where a number of rangers practice and improve their skills. On the east side of the road is the Odinialli Memorial Administration Building for the Iilandi University. The large University houses many of Ocean- crest's biggest minds in science and technology.
